A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great visuals\, Mark Hamill did amazing with what he was given. But this movie was totally horrible and not worthy of star wars. No character development\, plotholes as big as a death star. Just about everything as already been said I guess\, especially how they ruined Luke Skywalker. Will not watch future installments. No point and no interest after this complete trainwreck of a movie.
